title: An Edwardian Christmas
description: Illustrations without text depict the celebration of Christmas in an English country home at the turn of the century. Here, depicted in loving detail, is Christmas as it was at the beginning of the twentieth century, indoors and out, above stairs and below, as seen through the eyes of the same boy and girl whose progress through the sunlit peace of Edwardian England was celebrated in An Edwardian Summer.
author: John S. Goodall
